word[0]: have a mind of your own
definition[0]: to have strong opinions about things, and make your own decisions without being influenced by other people
example[0]: She’s a woman without fear, with a mind of her own, who says what she thinks.
definition[1]: if an object has a mind of its own, it seems to control itself and does not work or move in the way you want it to
example[1]: The bicycle seemed to have a mind of its own and I couldn’t steer it straight.
